sentences.english: A number of investigators have used the fluorescent-antibody (FA) technique for Salmonella detection.
sentences.chinese: 因此，沙門氏菌檢測的熒光抗體技術爲能被廣範應用。

sentences.english: The antibodies have been altered to fluoresce under certain conditions.
sentences.chinese: 在一定條件下，這些抗體被變成能發出熒光。

sentences.english: The collection of different antibody specificities expressed in an individual.
sentences.chinese: 是表達在一個體內特異性不同的抗體的總和。

sentences.english: Expression product of overal S genome fragment reacted to monoclonal antibody Lane 3.
sentences.chinese: 基因全長片段表達產物與單克隆抗體反應3。

sentences.english: The reshaping anti-CD28 single domain antibodies were constructed by using this method.
sentences.chinese: 利用該方法構建了改形抗CD28重鏈單域抗體。

sentences.english: Also, the subject invention provides a fibrin-specific monoclonal antibody.
sentences.chinese: 本發明還提供一種纖維蛋白特異性的單克隆抗體。

sentences.english: Results Anti HAV IgG positive rate of whole population increased significantly.
sentences.chinese: 結果疫苗接種後人羣總抗體陽性率有顯著的提高。

sentences.english: Desensitized patients are at high risk of developing acute antibody-mediated rejection.
sentences.chinese: 致敏患者有發生急性抗體介導的排斥反應的高度危險。

sentences.english: Conclusion Affinity maturation might have been completed by the time that patients presented with anti-GBM disease.
sentences.chinese: 結論起病時抗GBM抗體的親合力成熟過程已經完成。

sentences.english: Identical antibodies called monoclonal antibodies can be generated in large amounts against a therapeutic or diagnostic target.
sentences.chinese: 單克隆抗體可以在治療或診斷用靶子引導下大量產生。

sentences.english: Antibodies against ubiquitin are shown to inhibit tumor cell migration.
sentences.chinese: 抗泛素抗體顯示抑制腫瘤細胞遷移。

sentences.english: The change of anticardiolipin antibody was determined by enzyme linked immunoabsorbent assay (ELISA).
sentences.chinese: 抗心磷脂抗體採用酶聯免疫吸附法測定。

sentences.english: It was possible to produce phage antibody steadily in long time.
sentences.chinese: 它能在較長時間內穩定生產噬菌體抗體。

sentences.english: Insulin dose and insulin antibodies did not show relevant dissimilarities.
sentences.chinese: 對胰島素劑量與胰島素抗體的研究也未發現不一致性。

sentences.english: Conclusion Phage surface display technology is a useful method to produce human monoclonal antibody against CEA.
sentences.chinese: 結論噬菌體抗體庫技術是研製人源性單抗的有效途徑。

sentences.english: The two kinds of IgY could resist to the enzymolysis of pepsin, but were sensitivity to the trypsin.
sentences.chinese: 兩種抗體均可耐受胃蛋白酶作用，但對胰蛋白酶敏感。

definition: to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
